dialogues.name: Emilia
dialogues.dialogueText: Hi Breya! You made it! Did Mr. Soren give you trouble?

dialogues.name: Breya
dialogues.dialogueText: Not really, actually! Anyways, you remembered to bring your gear this time didn’t you?

dialogues.name: Emilia
dialogues.dialogueText: I wouldn’t dare forget it after the scolding you gave me. I saw a scrap metal dump to the No- Can you hear something?

dialogues.name: Breya
dialogues.dialogueText: Hmm… No? Oh wait, there it is! It sounds like… marching?

dialogues.name: Breya
dialogues.dialogueText: What?! Emilia, we have to run! If they find two scavengers...

dialogues.name: Emilia
dialogues.dialogueText: We can’t, Breya! There are more right behind us. See? Get ready for a fight!
